messages.messageBody:
Thank you Tracy! I appreciate your help!

Michelle

>From: "Tracy Oldfield" <Tracy@...-online.co.uk>

>allergies-help please!
>Date: Thu, 9 Mar 2000 01:27:38 -0000
>
>Maureen Minchin's Food for Thought is LLL(GB)'s recommended read on the
>subject, don't know if you can get it over there though.
>
>HTH
>Tracy
>
> From: "Michelle Bennett" <mlb_2boymom@...>
>
> Can anyone recommend some good books to read about food allergies? My
>baby
> has just had two severe reactions to egg yolks! I am wanting to learn
>all I
> possibly can about this-possible causes, outgrowing it, allergy vs.
> intolerance, foods to avoid, vaccines, etc.
>
> Michelle
